Package de.arnomann.martin.blobby.core.texture

Class AnimatedTexture

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.arnomann.martin.blobby.core.texture.AnimatedTexture
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ITexture
    public class AnimatedTexture
extends Object
implements ITexture
    Represents a texture that has animations.

      • AnimatedTexture

        public AnimatedTexture​(double animationTimeSecs,
                       String path)
        Creates a new animated texture.
        Parameters:
        animationTimeSecs - the time the animation will take.
        path - the path to the textures.

      • AnimatedTexture

        public AnimatedTexture​(double animationTimeSecs,
                       String path,
                       boolean playOnStart)
        Creates a new animated texture.
        Parameters:
        animationTimeSecs - the time the animation will take.
        path - the path to the textures.
        playOnStart - whether the animation should start right away or not.

      • AnimatedTexture

        public AnimatedTexture​(double animationTimeSecs,
                       String path,
                       int startingFrame)
        Creates a new animated texture.
        Parameters:
        animationTimeSecs - the time the animation will take.
        path - the path to the textures.
        startingFrame - the frame id on which the animation should start.

      • AnimatedTexture

                       boolean playOnStart,
                       int startingFrame)
        Creates a new animated texture.
        Parameters:
        animationTimeSecs - the time the animation will take.
        path - the path to the textures.
        playOnStart - whether the animation should start right away or not.
        startingFrame - the frame id on which the animation should start.
